content: materials - 2 4 skeins of purl soho s sweetgrass 1 65% organic cotton and 35% superfine alpaca each skein is 437 yards/ 100 grams approximately 805 1655 total yards required we used the color buckwheat beige - us 4 3 5mm straight or 24-inch circular needles 2 gauge 25 stitches and 44 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes scarf wrap finished dimensions 9 18¾ inches wide x 72½ inches long designed for purl soho by sarah opie 3 after spending most of her adult life in australia sarah recently returned to her other home canada while working on her master s degree in architecture she felt a pull to combine her talent for design with her love of knitting she now focuses primarily on her designs for knitting and recently weaving too all images ©️ copyright purl soho 1 https //www purlsoho com/sweetgrass html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802 3 https //www instagram com/s knits/
